item.description:
Some friends & I are going out dancing, come join us! Or just drink & gawk (some of my friends might).

We'll be able to get wristbands for drink specials from 9:30-11:30. $3 for draft beer, house & call drinks, & house wine. As a special, there will be no cover charge. Just tell them you're with the party for "Jason Kulas".

The music there normally seems to be about like what you'd hear on 101.3 FM.

HOST: Jason, cell # in RSVP. You should probably text, since it's a noisy club. If you're arriving after 9:30, try to text before you arrive. If I'm in back dancing and have a bad signal I won't even see your text until I wander to the front sometime.

I'm somewhat tall, 6'3", which may help in locating me. I'll update this later with what I'm wearing that day
item.name: Fri. 10/21 - Drinkin' & dancin' in New Haven
